message.errorApiError.message: Response failed, please try again later

message.errorUsedUp.description: Error message when the package usage has reached the limit

message.errorTimeout.description: Error message when answering the question has timed out

message.howToUse.description: Information on how to line break

message.nameRequired.description: Error message when the name is required
